text: Møbelringen Cup 2008 was held in Norway, in the cities of Oslo, Gjøvik and Lillestrøm. The tournament started on 21 November and finished on 23 November 2008. Norway won the event by winning all their matches. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=220|Team !width=20|Pts !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D !width=20|L !width=20|PF !width=20|PA |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |align=left| |6||3||3||0||0||101||63 |- bgcolor= |align=left| |3||3||1||1||1||83||80 |- bgcolor= |align=left| |3||3||1||1||1||75||81 |- bgcolor= |align=left| |0||3||0||0||3||57||92 |} All times are Central European Time (UTC+1) \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == All-Star Team == *Goalkeeper: *Left Wing: *Back Player: *Back Player: *Back Player: *Right Wing: *Line Player: ==References== *Official Site Category:2008 in handball 2008 Category:2008 in Norwegian sport
